item.title: Color Quest
item.description: DONE! And just in time! Late on Friday 15th February 2019, we submitted our entry for the “Science Comics for Kids” competition by the Austrian Academy of Sciences (Ã–AW). Our story is about a little girl who loves to draw. One day due to a weird accident all her colours disappear. She goes on a quest to bring her colours back, and learns something about the science behind colour along the way.
